articles.author: Mohammad Salem, Nidal Al-Mughrabi
articles.description: The Israeli military took control of the vital Rafah border crossing between Gaza and Egypt on Tuesday, pushing into the southern Gazan town after a night of air strikes and as prospects for a ceasefire deal hung in the balance.
articles.title: Israeli military takes control of vital Rafah crossing from Gaza into Egypt
Payments in focus as prosecutors make their case in Trump hush money trial

articles.author: Trevor Hunnicutt, James Oliphant
articles.description: When U.S. President Joe Biden arrives at the U.S. Capitol on Tuesday to honor 6 million Jews killed eight decades ago, his message will be as much about the present as the past.
articles.title: Biden to condemn antisemitism, praise free speech at Holocaust remembrance

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: French President Emmanuel Macron welcomes Chinese President Xi Jinping in the Pyrenees mountains on Tuesday, for the second day of a trip during which Xi showed little sign of being ready to offer major concessions on trade or foreign policy.
articles.title: Macron seeks to charm Xi into trade concessions in Pyrenees jaunt

articles.author: Dan Peleschuk
articles.description: Rumbling out of its forest hideout, the hulking German-supplied howitzer has only a few minutes to fire before slipping back under cover to evade Russian surveillance in the skies above.
articles.title: Fire and hide: Ukraine's artillery pinned down by Russian drones

articles.author: Guy Faulconbridge
articles.description: Vladimir Putin, honoured like a Russian tsar at his swearing-in for a new six-year presidential term, had a double-edged message for the West: the Kremlin is ready to talk but Russia is girding for victory in Ukraine.
articles.title: 'Tsar' Putin tells the West: Russia will talk only on equal terms

articles.author: Amanda Perobelli, Leonardo Benansatto
articles.description: Rescuers rushed to evacuate people stranded by devastating floods across the southern Brazilian state of Rio Grande do Sul on Tuesday, with 90 reported dead and desperate survivors seeking food and basic supplies.
articles.title: Brazil floods death toll rises to 90, dozens still stranded

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: A U.S. soldier who has been detained in Russia travelled to the Russian city of Vladivostok through China without clearance from the military, the U.S. Army said on Tuesday.
articles.title: US soldier detained in Russia travelled through China without clearance- Army

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Hamas official Osama Hamdan warned on Tuesday that if Israel's military aggression continues in Rafah, there will be no ceasefire deal.
articles.title: Hamas official warns of no ceasefire deal if Israeli aggression on Gaza continues

articles.author: Andrew Goudsward
articles.description: Donald Trump demanded that federal prosecutors reveal details about how they handled boxes seized during a search of his Florida home in 2022 as he seeks to delay the case accusing him of illegally holding onto classified documents, according to a court filing made public on Tuesday.
articles.title: Trump seeks records about evidence handling in latest bid to delay documents case
